summary: Merge the all the "Re: Re:" in e-mail subjects in only one.
name: Mail_Re.set
description:
May be, you have allready noticed and used the two macros : ,re that merges all the "[Rr][Ee]:" in the subject in only one "Re:" and ,Re that merges "[Rr][Re]: Re[n]" in "Re[n+1]". 
This file combines the features from both macros without any visual bell or incremention of the first number in the subject.
install_details: Copy the file anywhere you want. Source it from your e-mail pluggins file and then call the function Mail_Re() or map it to anything you want.
